sourcesContent:
<template>
    <ion-page>
        <ion-header translucent>
            <ion-toolbar>
                <ion-title>iBuy</ion-title>
            </ion-toolbar>

        </ion-header>
        <ion-content fullscreen>
            
            <ion-searchbar placeholder="Escreva sua lista" class="outputInput" >
                <ion-icon name="add-outline">
                    <ion-button color="light">Inserir</ion-button>
                </ion-icon>
            </ion-searchbar>
            
             

            <!--<ion-item>
                <ion-checkbox color="tertiary" >
                    <ion-label>{{ insertBuy }}</ion-label>   
                </ion-checkbox>
                
            </ion-item>-->

        </ion-content>
        <ion-item>
                <ion-input v-model="outputInput" type="text" enterkeyhint="search" placeholder="Escreva sua lista"></ion-input>
                <ion-button @click="insertItems()" class="outputButton" color="light" >Inserir</ion-button>
                <ion-label v-model="list" class="outputUl" ></ion-label>
        </ion-item>   
    </ion-page>
</template>

<script>
import { IonSearchbar, IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonIcon, IonCheckbox, IonLabel, IonItem, IonButton, IonInput } from '@ionic/vue';
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';

export default defineComponent({
    name: 'InsertItems',
    components: { 
        IonSearchbar,  IonPage, IonHeader, IonToolbar, IonContent, IonIcon, IonCheckbox, IonLabel, IonItem, IonButton, IonInput
    },
    data() {
        return{
           //insertBuy: null, 
           list: '',
           searchInput: '',
           //searchBtn: '',
           myHistory: [],
        }
        
    },
    methods:{
        insertItems(){

            if (this.list !== ''){
                myHistory.unshift(this.list);
                list.innerHTML = '';

                for(var i = 0; i < myHistory.length; i++){
                    itemText = myHistory[i];
                    var listItem = document.createElement('ion-label');
                    listItem.textContent = itemText;
                    list.appendChild(listItem);
                }
                searchInput.value = '';
                searchInput.focus();
            }
        }
    },
});


</script>

<style>
    ion-searchbar{
       --border-radius: 20px;
    }
    
</style>
